text: kraoyomk nowpel del mou sa ban bampenh tam pelkamnt ruoch( rypel db chhna) haey keat ban thveudamnaer cheamuoynung kruosaear robsa keat( towkean tukdei ehsaib) keat kaban kheunh ponluphleung muoy now kber cheungophnom tuo r . keat ban pol towkean kruosaear robsa keat tha saum puok anak now tinih sen choh pitabrakd nasa khnhom bankheunh ponluphleung muoy sangkhumtha khnhom nung noam damnoeng khleah pi vea ryyka yk dom phleung mk bangkeat aoy puok anak daembi aoy puok anak kam daw khluon
